string.text: {=ROTwandererstr001}My name don't matter
{=ROTwandererstr002}You got the money, I'll do the job
{=ROTwandererstr003}It's a grim world out there, I'll do what I have to do.
{=ROTwandererstr004}Patch your wounds, manage your house, even sell your wares.
{=ROTwandererstr005}Alright, I just need your sword
{=ROTwandererstr006}Aren't you a pleasure to talk to.
{=ROTwandererstr007}Not trying to be the hero, that's your story.
